name: Dishandtopy
description:
Dishandtopy is our first video game experiment as a team. It's a local and competitive video game where you have to fight the dungeon master as a hero or vice versa. One player pick the hero and the another one pick the villain. The objective of the hero is to reach the final of the dungeon and the objective of the villain is to defeat the hero using his powers and traps.

This game was made by: 

Alberto Navarro Gordillo (@forameuss) – Programmer and sound designer.

Jaime Maguilla Salado (@Anacardo34) – Programmer.

Francisco Javier Sánchez-Mellado Engo – Illustrator.

Magdalena Almero Nocea (@MagdalenaAlmero) – Illustrator.

José María Cala Barrionuevo (@SRPDrawShow) – 2D Animator.

Diego García-Rojo Pérez (@diegofreetless) – Musician and game designer.

Ignacio Pérez Mateo (@naxvader) – Game designer.
